verses.verse: וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> shall be when תָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> And it shall be when thou [art] come in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> thee [for] an inheritance וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֖הּ <S%H3423><s%> and possessest וְיָשַׁ֥בְתָּ <S%H3427><s%> it and dwellest בָּֽהּ׃

וְלָקַחְתָּ֞ <S%H3947><s%> That thou shalt take מֵרֵאשִׁ֣ית ׀ <S%H7225><s%> of the first כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> of all the fruit הָאֲדָמָ֗ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which תָּבִ֧יא <S%H935><s%> which thou shalt bring מֵֽאַרְצְךָ֛ <S%H776><s%> of thy land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָ֖ךְ וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <S%H7760><s%> thee and shalt put בַטֶּ֑נֶא <S%H2935><s%> [it] in a basket וְהָֽלַכְתָּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> and shalt go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַר֙ <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וּבָאתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> And thou shalt go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> that shall be in those days הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִגַּ֤דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> unto him I profess הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> this day לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> that I am come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the country אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <S%H7650><s%> sware יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> unto our fathers לָ֥תֶת <S%H5414><s%> for to give לָֽנוּ׃

וְלָקַ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> shall take הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest הַטֶּ֖נֶא <S%H2935><s%> the basket מִיָּדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> out of thine hand וְהִ֨נִּיח֔וֹ <S%H3240><s%> and set it down לִפְנֵ֕י <S%H6440><s%> before מִזְבַּ֖ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

וְעָנִ֨יתָ <S%H6030><s%> And thou shalt speak וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <S%H559><s%> and say לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֲרַמִּי֙ <S%H761><s%> A Syrian אֹבֵ֣ד <S%H6><s%> ready to perish אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> [was] my father וַיֵּ֣רֶד <S%H3381><s%> and he went down מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וַיָּ֥גָר <S%H1481><s%> and sojourned שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there בִּמְתֵ֣י <S%H4462><s%> Memucan מְעָ֑ט <S%H4592><s%> a few וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> became שָׁ֕ם <S%H8033><s%> there לְג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> and became there a nation גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great עָצ֥וּם <S%H6099><s%> mighty וָרָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> and populous

וַיָּרֵ֧עוּ <S%H7489><s%> evil entreated אֹתָ֛נוּ <S%H854><s%> for הַמִּצְרִ֖ים <S%H4713><s%> And the Egyptians וַיְעַנּ֑וּנוּ <S%H6031><s%> us and afflicted וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> us and laid עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and עֲבֹדָ֥ה <S%H5656><s%> bondage קָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7186><s%> upon us hard

וַנִּצְעַ֕ק <S%H6817><s%> And when we cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> of our fathers וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹלֵ֔נוּ <S%H6963><s%> our voice וַיַּ֧רְא <S%H7200><s%> and looked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָנְיֵ֛נוּ <S%H6040><s%> on our affliction וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמָלֵ֖נוּ <S%H5999><s%> and our labour וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לַחֲצֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3906><s%> and our oppression

וַיּוֹצִאֵ֤נוּ <S%H3318><s%> brought us forth יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt בְּיָ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָה֙ <S%H2389><s%> with a mighty וּבִזְרֹ֣עַ <S%H2220><s%> arm נְטוּיָ֔ה <S%H5186><s%> and with an outstretched וּבְמֹרָ֖א <S%H4172><s%> terribleness גָּדֹ֑ל <S%H1419><s%> and with great וּבְאֹת֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> and with signs וּבְמֹפְתִֽים׃ <S%H4159><s%> and with wonders

וַיְבִאֵ֖נוּ <S%H935><s%> And he hath brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> us into this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and hath given לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> us this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [even] a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> and honey

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הֵבֵ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> And now behold I have brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵאשִׁית֙ <S%H7225><s%> the first פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> of the produce הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> of the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥תָּה <S%H5414><s%> hast given לִּ֖י יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> which thou O LORD וְהִנַּחְתּ֗וֹ <S%H3240><s%> me And thou shalt set לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> it before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוִ֔יתָ <S%H7812><s%> and worship לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֣ <S%H8056><s%> glad בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַטּ֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> in every good אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> hath given לְךָ֛ יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [thing] which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וּלְבֵיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> unto thee and unto thine house אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> and you וְהַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> thou and the Levite וְהַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> and the stranger אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּקִרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> that [is] among ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When תְכַלֶּ֞ה <S%H3615><s%> When thou hast made an end לַ֠עְשֵׂר <S%H6237><s%> of tithing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעְשַׂ֧ר <S%H4643><s%> all the tithes תְּבוּאָתְךָ֛ <S%H8393><s%> of thine increase בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֖ת <S%H7992><s%> the third שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> [which is] the year הַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֑ר <S%H4643><s%> of tithing וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> and hast given לַלֵּוִ֗י <S%H3881><s%> [it] unto the Levite לַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> the stranger לַיָּת֣וֹם <S%H3490><s%> the fatherless וְלָֽאַלְמָנָ֔ה <S%H490><s%> and the widow וְאָכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> that they may eat בִשְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <S%H8179><s%> within thy gates וְשָׂבֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H7646><s%> and be filled

וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <S%H559><s%> Then thou shalt say לִפְנֵי֩ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בִּעַ֧רְתִּי <S%H1197><s%> I have brought away הַקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the hallowed things מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> any הַבַּ֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> out of [mine] house וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> and also נְתַתִּ֤יו <S%H5414><s%> and also have given לַלֵּוִי֙ <S%H3881><s%> them unto the Levite וְלַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> and unto the stranger לַיָּת֣וֹם <S%H3490><s%> to the fatherless וְלָאַלְמָנָ֔ה <S%H490><s%> and to the widow כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all מִצְוָתְךָ֖ <S%H4687><s%> according to all thy commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּיתָ֑נִי <S%H6680><s%> which thou hast commanded לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not עָבַ֥רְתִּי <S%H5674><s%> me I have not transgressed מִמִּצְוֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H4687><s%> thy commandments וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or שָׁכָֽחְתִּי׃ <S%H7911><s%> neither have I forgotten

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אָכַ֨לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> I have not eaten בְאֹנִ֜י <S%H205><s%> thereof in my mourning מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> any וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor בִעַ֤רְתִּי <S%H1197><s%> neither have I taken away מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> any בְּטָמֵ֔א <S%H2931><s%> [ought] thereof for [any] unclean וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> [use] nor given מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> any לְמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> [ought] thereof for the dead שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> [but] I have hearkened בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> to the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔י <S%H430><s%> my God עָשִׂ֕יתִי <S%H6213><s%> [and] have done כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you צִוִּיתָֽנִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> according to all that thou hast commanded

הַשְׁקִיפָה֩ <S%H8259><s%> Look down מִמְּע֨וֹן <S%H4583><s%> habitation קָדְשְׁךָ֜ <S%H6944><s%> from thy holy מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וּבָרֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> and bless אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> thy people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> and the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תָּה <S%H5414><s%> which thou hast given לָ֑נוּ כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H7650><s%> us as thou swarest לַאֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> unto our fathers אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> and honey ס

הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> This day הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> This יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מְצַוְּךָ֧ <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <S%H6213><s%> thee to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֻקִּ֥ים <S%H2706><s%> these statutes הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֑ים <S%H4941><s%> and judgments וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֤ <S%H8104><s%> thou shalt therefore keep וְעָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> and do אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> them with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> and with all thy soul

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הֶאֱמַ֖רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> Thou hast avouched הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day לִהְיוֹת֩ <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֨ לֵֽאלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> to be thy God וְלָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> walk בִּדְרָכָ֗יו <S%H1870><s%> in his ways וְלִשְׁמֹ֨ר <S%H8104><s%> and to keep חֻקָּ֧יו <S%H2706><s%> his statutes וּמִצְוֹתָ֛יו <S%H4687><s%> and his commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <S%H4941><s%> and his judgments וְלִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> and to hearken בְּקֹלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6963><s%> unto his voice

וַֽיהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD הֶאֱמִֽירְךָ֣ <S%H559><s%> hath avouched הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לוֹ֙ לְעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> people סְגֻלָּ֔ה <S%H5459><s%> to be his peculiar כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> as he hath promised לָ֑ךְ וְלִשְׁמֹ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> thee and that [thou] shouldest keep כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4687><s%> all his commandments

וּֽלְתִתְּךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> And to make עֶלְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> thee high עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> above all nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> which he hath made לִתְהִלָּ֖ה <S%H8416><s%> in praise וּלְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> and in name וּלְתִפְאָ֑רֶת <S%H8597><s%> and in honour וְלִֽהְיֹתְךָ֧ <S%H1961><s%> become עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people קָדֹ֛שׁ <S%H6918><s%> and that thou mayest be an holy לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> as he hath spoken ס
